data.meta_site_name: Scotch Galore Whiskies – The Alternative to Auctions
data.text:
Description

Dufftown Distillery, nestled in the heart of Scotland’s Speyside region, is a celebrated whisky producer with a rich history dating back to 1896. Known as the “Whisky Capital of the World,” Dufftown lives up to its reputation by crafting exceptional Scotch whisky. The distillery’s flagship expression, Glenfiddich, is renowned globally for its quality and craftsmanship. Dufftown’s picturesque location, surrounded by lush greenery and pristine water sources, contributes to the unique character of its whiskies. The distillery prides itself on traditional methods, including copper pot stills and oak casks, ensuring a distinct flavour profile that blends fruitiness, sweetness, and a hint of oak. Visitors can explore the distillery, witnessing the intricate whisky-making process and enjoying tastings of their remarkable creations. Dufftown Distillery remains a must-visit destination for whisky enthusiasts seeking a genuine Scottish whisky experience.

Distillery: Dufftown

Region: Speyside

Age: 8 Years Old

Strength: 40% abv

Bottle Size: 700 ml
